text: Ej Pajomʙar, agar zanoni mu'min nazdi tu omadand, to ʙaj'at (ahdu pajmon) kunand, ʙa in sart, ki hec kasro ʙo Allohi ʙarhaq dar iʙodatas sarik nakunand va cizero duzdi nakunand va zino nakunand va farzandoni xudro pes jo ʙa'd az tavallud nakusand va farzandonero, ki az savharonason nestand, ʙa duruƣ ʙa onho nisʙat nadihand va dar korhoi nek nofarmonii tu nakunand, pas dar in surat, ʙo onho ʙaj'at kun va ʙarojason az Alloh omurzis ʙixoh, ki haroina, Alloh ʙaroi ʙandagone, ki tavʙa mekunand, omurzandavu mehruʙon ast
